Description: Worn limestone stela(trapezoidal top) divided into three registers: 1 - Deceased adoring Osiris(enthroned), Isis(?) and Nephthys(?), offering-table in-between. 2 - Deceased and wife seated before an offering-table behind which stands a figure with an incense-burner; to the right is the figure of Nut as a tree. 3 - Mummy of the deceased and a procession of mourners.
